vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
Centra4.transfer (patch_1.sol#4-24) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.register(CentraToken) (patch_1.sol#15)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function transfer(address to, uint256 value) public returns (bool) {}

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (patch_1.sol#1): it allows old versions
